SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Service Coverage Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Service Coverage Rate is On-Time Delivery Rate

SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Service Coverage Rate is Route Efficiency .

SRP.Q: On the Damage/Loss Rate , is the point for Patterson, Roberts and Bates inside or outside the point for Dominguez Ltd?
SRP.A: On the Damage/Loss Rate , the point for Patterson, Roberts and Bates is inside the point for Dominguez Ltd.

VPR.Q: On dimension Vehicle Utilization Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Vehicle Utilization Rate, label {Patterson, Roberts and Bates} scores the lowest.
